reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be high quality, comfortable, and perfect for work, with a flattering A-line style that can be dressed up. They appreciate its super soft fabric, good material, and warmth, with one customer noting it's ideal for fall days. They like the pockets, and one mentions it's perfect for an air-conditioned office. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Bought this dress for a fall wedding. I paired it with a decorative leather belt and matching boots and it looked really nice. Comfy too. Fabric was just right so that I was not too hot or too cold. Color was as pictured. True to size. A good choice for a casual look or could be dressed up. Read more
items.author: Christi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Beautiful dress! Perfect fit! Probably my favorite dress I have! Will buy more!! So soft and comfortable! Also has pockets! The fabric is soft and heavy but in a good way! Read more
items.author: Xan_the_man 007

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many compliments!
items.body: This was recommended to me by an influencer on social media, and they were not wrong! I now own this dress in 3 different colors. I receive so many compliments when I wear it. I am an elementary school teacher, and it is perfect for work! Super cute with flats or boots! True to size. So soft. There is a heaviness to the material that doesn't feel cheap. I really enjoy this brand and have bought a couple of things from them. Read more
items.author: ElementaryScTeacher

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maybe for someone who can wear a square neck
items.body: I wanted to love this dress! Pockets and everything! Unfortunately the square neck did not look good on me to officiate a wedding. Read more
items.author: Beth A Hartman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall/winter dress.
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! The material is soft, warm and very comfortable. The cut is flattering and I’ve received many compliments while wearing it. I originally purchased the stone blue color and now I’m getting a Burgundy one for the holidays. Read more
items.author: Taryn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Dress! Versatile! Comfortable!
items.body: I love this dress! I am a plus girl. I love the fit, style, feel of fabric, stretch, material thickness. Perfect for fall and winter. I bought my dress in a dark gray. I switch the look with various scarves, different colors of sweaters and dusters. Great price for a good quality dress. The color was exactly what I had anticipated. I am going to buy a couple more in different colors! Read more
items.author: K. Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Love this dress. Great fabric and fit is true to size. It’s a good weight for fall and winter. Read more
items.author: Melanee Webert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love all 6 I have purchased .
items.body: I have now purchased 6 of these dresses in different colors for my 91 year old mom. I’ve paired them with different wrap shawls from urban coco ( an 5 star plug for them) and some inexpensive costume jewelry. She looks so beautiful and gets lots of compliments. The dresses (and wraps) are so soft and comfy. They are a bit on the heavier and thick side but she is always cold so they are perfect. I can’t say enough good things about this dress. Note: you do not have to be 91 the look amazing in these dresses. Read more
items.author: Dorothy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, Khaki, Burgundy, Stone Blue, Carbon Grey, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
